es.eucm.eadandroid.common.data.chapter.conversation.line
Class ConversationLine

java.lang.Object
  es.eucm.eadandroid.common.data.chapter.conversation.line.ConversationLine
All Implemented Interfaces:
Named, Cloneable
public class ConversationLine
extends Object
implements Cloneable, Named

This class stores a single conversation line, along with the name of the speaker character.

Field Summary
private  String audioPath
          Path for the audio track where the line is recorded.
private  Conditions conditions
          Conditions associated to this line

          String that holds the name of the character.
static String PLAYER
          Constant for the player identifier for the lines.
private  boolean synthesizerVoice
          Tell if the line has to be read by synthesizer
private  String text
          Sentence said by the character.
